title: Roscoe Wallace is Here and Talks About Sand and Soul 03.28.17
itunes:title: Roscoe Wallace is Here and Talks About Sand and Soul 03.28.17
description:
Roscoe says he's performing at Sand and Soul. Eugene and Oatmeal ask the crew to vote on who should have a segment. The Crew talks Dave Chappelle and his discovery of how funny Kevin Hart is.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
